attributes.action: Stop David Davis passing on the costs of his principles to the tax and poll tax payer by making him pay all the costs for a by election that is not necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many politicians spend too much of tax payers money on investigations, enquiries etc. that are no use to anybody and very rarely lay the blame at any persons feet.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
